entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story who is dealing with a Bludger. He is determined to continue playing and not give up.

entities.name: oliver
entities.description: Oliver is mentioned as someone who needs to be told to leave Harry alone.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is one of the twins and is angry with Wood for telling Harry to get the Snitch or die trying.

entities.name: wood
entities.description: Wood is a teacher who is being scolded by George for his instructions to Harry.

entities.name: madam hooch
entities.description: Madam Hooch is a teacher who joins the group and asks Wood if they are ready to resume play.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: Slytherin is a team that Harry's team does not want to lose to.

entities.name: bludger
entities.description: The Bludger is an object that is causing trouble for Harry and his team.

relationships.description: George scolds Wood for telling Harry to get the Snitch or die trying.
George is angry with Wood and scolds him.
Madam Hooch asks Wood if they are ready to resume play.
Harry is dealing with the Bludger and trying to get rid of it.
Wood is concerned that they will lose to Slytherin if they stop playing.
